statements: SELECT id, timestamp, duration FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT footage_url, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, footage_url FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, duration FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY duration ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, camera_id, footage_url, timestamp, duration FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE duration > '1 hour' AND camera_id = 2;
SELECT id, timestamp::date, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM timestamp) AS hour FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp::date = '2022-05-15' ORDER BY hour ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM duration)) AS avg_duration_seconds FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM security_camera_footage GROUP BY camera_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM security_cameras
SELECT camera_id, location FROM security_cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC
SELECT location, install_date FROM security_cameras WHERE install_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM footage_storage ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(footage_id) AS total_footage FROM footage_storage GROUP BY camera_id HAVING COUNT(footage_id) > 10
SELECT * FROM security_cameras WHERE camera_id = 100;
SELECT location, install_date FROM security_cameras WHERE install_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS recording_count FROM footage_storage GROUP BY camera_id;
SELECT * FROM security_cameras ORDER BY install_date DESC;

SELECT location, timestamp FROM security_cameras JOIN footage_storage ON security_cameras.camera_id = footage_storage.camera_id WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM camera_footage;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM camera_location ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, footage_id, analysis_result FROM footage_analysis WHERE analysis_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM camera_location WHERE floor_level = 2 AND latitude < 40.0;
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, video_file_path FROM camera_footage WHERE footage_id = 5;
SELECT f.video_file_path, l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM camera_footage f JOIN camera_location l ON f.camera_id = l.camera_id;

SELECT a.analysis_result, a.analysis_timestamp, f.video_file_path, l.location_name FROM footage_analysis a JOIN camera_footage f ON a.footage_id = f.footage_id JOIN camera_location l ON f.camera_id = l.camera_id;
SELECT f.footage_id, f.timestamp, l.location_name, l.floor_level FROM camera_footage f JOIN camera_location l ON f.camera_id = l.camera_id WHERE l.latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM cameras WHERE resolution = 'HD';
SELECT timestamp, description FROM events WHERE camera_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM footage WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT playback_id, event_id, timestamp FROM playback WHERE playback_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT location, resolution FROM cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM cameras WHERE resolution = '4K';
SELECT events.event_id, events.timestamp, cameras.location FROM events JOIN cameras ON events.camera_id = cameras.camera_id ORDER BY events.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras
SELECT footage_id, timestamp, resolution FROM footage WHERE resolution = 'HD'
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT * FROM playback WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE status = 'resolved'
SELECT * FROM footage WHERE resolution='HD' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT camera_id, location, model FROM cameras WHERE status=true ORDER BY installation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin' ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM playback WHERE playback_duration>'00:10:00' AND user_id=1 ORDER BY playback_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT footage_id, incident_description, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE status='resolved' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
